full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I GTER CHOG DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024A *, ,(CES MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG GI GTOR CHOG DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS GSUNG BYIN NAS CAN DU MA YOD BZHIN DU, YAN LAG BRGYAD LDAN GYI MTSO'I 'GRAM @024B DU BA TSA'I KHRON PA BRKO BA'I DAL PA 'DI 'DRA MI DGOS 'JUG KYANG, RANG GI GAM DU GNAS MCHOD DPON BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS, MGON PO'I MNGON RTOGS, BSKANGS BSHAGS, BZLAS PA, GTOR MA 'BUL, BSTOD BSKUL SOGS CHA TSANG ZHING, TSIG NYUNG RGYUN 'KHYER DU BYED RGYU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN GYIS BSKUL @025A *, ,NGOR, BSKANGS BSHAGS GNYIS RJE BLA MA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO MDZAD PA DANG, BSTOD PA RNYING GZHIR BZHAG ,GZHAN RNAMS TSEG SBYOR GSAR DU BGYIS TE BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS SKYED TSAL YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL DU SBYAR BA'I DGE BA'I YE SHES MGON PO RJES SU 'DZIN PAR @025B GYUR CIG ,ZHES PA 'DI NI MGON PO'I BSKANGS BSHAGS KYI MDOR BSDUS PA 'DI NI KHRI CHAD GSOL BA LA NYE BAR MKHO'I DON DU, ^ZHVA SER COD PAn DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO RDO RJE SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,)
